explains: adj. （与）修辞（有关）的；反问的，反诘的；巧辩的，说话虚夸的
wordGroup: rhetorical question 反问；设问；修辞性疑问句

sentences.en: These arguments may have been used as a rhetorical device to argue for a perpetuation of a United Nations role.
sentences.cn: 这些争论可能已被用作支持联合国角色永存的一种修辞手段。

sentences.en: It helps the reader learn rhetorical devices.
sentences.cn: 它帮助读者学习修辞手段。

sentences.en: 'Don't you care what I do?' he asked, but it was a rhetorical question.
sentences.cn: “我做什么，难道你不关心吗？”他问道，可那是个反问。
